songs.title: Mirror
songs.lyrics:
(Mirror, mirror)
Ain't it plain to see?
Tell me, honestly
Don't my eyes speak up for me?
(Mirror, mirror)
You're always true to me
How can I make it real?
Why can't you see the way I feel?

(Mirror, mirror)
Ain't it plain to see?
Tell me, honestly
Don't my eyes speak up for me?
(Mirror, mirror)
You're always true to me
How can I make it real?
Why can't you see the way I feel?
